segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and my stomach is churning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is pooling everywhere on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is standing right in it, completely unaware of the slippery surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could easily slip and fall, perhaps hitting her head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children! That stool looks incredibly unstable under the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed, and it's tilting, ready to go backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high for the cookie jar, utterly absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could hit his head, or break the plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of a child getting hurt makes me feel truly anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl is so close; she might get caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for disaster, and I feel powerless just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I can't intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
